articles.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin's Siddharth Bodke gets hitched; Aishwarya Sharma, Ayesha Singh and others at - The Times of India
articles.description: Siddharth Bodke, known for his role as Jagtap Mane in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin, has tied the knot with Marathi TV actress Titeekshaa Tawde. The wedding was attended by Aishwarya Sharma, Ayesha Singh, and other actors from the show.
